trends: There have been no other sightings in Matewan
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: object was sighted hovering over the williamson wva area
divs: Sighting DetailsObject was witnessed by several people in the Williamson Wva area and the Pikeville Ky area, witness stated that they saw a object hovering in the sky and appeared to be oblong and ran vertical and at times appeared to get brighter, they stated that the object hovered around for about a hour,we were not witnessess but we would like to know what it could have been, and why noone has said anything else about this, also after this sighting is when Whitesburg KY had a earthquake and then shortly after that we had the hurricane Sandy, We are just courious if you all had any information about this.
